aggregateData.content: We gather aggregated, non-identifying traffic data. We may use and share aggregate, de-identified, and anonymous data without restriction. Health information is protected under Legacy Concierge's separate Privacy Practices Notice, which takes precedence in conflicts.
aggregateData.title: Aggregate Data

personalData.content: We collect personal information when users register, create accounts, or make purchases. Examples include names, phone numbers, addresses, emails, and payment information.
personalData.title: Personal Data

contact.content: Users can update information or ask questions by visiting our contact page at https://legacyconcierge.com/contact or calling (310) 974-4517.
contact.title: Contact Information

controls.content: Users can view, update, or deactivate personal information through account settings where available. However, archived copies may persist due to third-party systems.
controls.title: User Controls

description: Privacy Policy for Legacy Concierge - How we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
heading: Privacy Policy

restrictions.children: Children: Interactive features aren't designed for users under 17. Contact us if children under 13 provide data without parental consent.
restrictions.external: External Links: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of linked third-party websites.
restrictions.forums: Public Forums: Information shared in message boards or chat rooms becomes public and isn't protected by this policy.
restrictions.social: Social Media: Third-party platforms operate under their own privacy policies.
restrictions.title: Notable Restrictions

scope.content: This policy governs information collected through Legacy Concierge websites only. By your use of the Website, You agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Third-party sites and social media platforms operate under separate policies.
scope.title: Scope

security.content: We employ security measures to protect your information. However, data transmission over the Internet cannot be guaranteed to be completely secure. Users assume transmission risks.
security.title: Security & Limitations

title: Privacy Policy - Legacy Concierge

usage.intro: Legacy Concierge uses personal data to provide services and may share it with:

items.business: Successor organizations in business transfers or acquisitions
items.combined: Third-party service providers (email vendors, payment processors) and affiliate/subsidiary entities
items.legal: Legal authorities when required by law or to protect our rights
items.thirdParty: Business partners who help deliver our services

usage.title: Data Usage & Sharing
